author: parithosh
content:
Nope, I just restarted teku-besu today to enable ethstats. So it should have synced way past merge block. Lighthouse-besu has been untouched since friday/sat i think (pre merge)

Nethermind being stuck at the merge block is totally unrelated to restarts and the team is looking into it afaik

author: robocopsgonemad
content: thank you for doing that btw. not touching light-besu means some very helpful clues were preserved in logs
